item.title: Trump plan to deport migrants a 'disgrace', says Pope
item.description: Francis previously said that Trump cannot be a Christian if he plans to build a wall to keep migrants from Mexico out.

item.title: Brexit fishing row heads for trade court showdown
item.description: The UK has banned European vessels from catching the silvery fish species in its North Sea waters but the EU is challenging the move.

item.title: Indian man jailed for life for rape and murder of doctor
item.description: The crime sparked widespread anger and fears over the safety of healthcare workers in India.

item.title: Missing US journalist's mother visits Syria to renew search
item.description: Debra Tice says she has "no idea" where her son is following the fall of Bashar al-Assad's regime.

item.title: China executes man for car rampage that killed dozens
item.description: The attacker ploughed into people outside a stadium in the country's deadliest attack in a decade.
